ResearchProjectDef.label: Stonestacking
ResearchProjectDef.description: gather pebble or rock chunks and stack them into drystack,or make them as material of walls.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Stonecrushing
ResearchProjectDef.description: crush rock chunks into crushed stone in order to make them as building material or make them into brick after research stonecutting.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Early Machining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using math and tools to make some complex siege engines or fortifications.
